mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REQUEST( REQ_SEQ, USER_SEQ, PIANO_SEQ, REQ_CONTENT, PHOTO_DIR, PREF_DATE, REGDATE, UPDDATE, UPDATER_SEQ, REQ_TITLE )VALUES( REQ_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{user_seq}, #{piano_seq}, #{req_content}, #{photo_dir}, #{pref_date}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{user_seq}, #{req_title} )
mapper.select: SELECT R.REQ_SEQ AS REQ_SEQ, R.PIANO_SEQ AS PIANO_SEQ, P.PIANO_NAME AS PIANO_NAME, R.REQ_TITLE AS REQ_TITLE, R.REGDATE AS REGDATE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DEAL GROUP BY REQ_SEQ HAVING REQ_SEQ=R.REQ_SEQ) AS BIDS FROM REQUEST R, PIANO P, DEAL D WHERE USER_SEQ=#{0} AND R.PIANO_SEQ=P.PIANO_SEQ
